Past Briefings Recordings

Catch up on anything you might have missed.

OpenShift Commons Briefing: Networking and OpenShift V3 By Clayton Coleman

OpenShift's Clayton Coleman will discuss some of the technical details around networking in OpeShift 3

OpenShift Commons Briefing: Ops Lessons Learned at OpenShift Online By Adam Miller

OpenShift's Adam Miller walks us through how OpenShift does Operations.

OpenShift Commons Briefing: OpenShift V3 release By Mike Barrett

OpenShift Product Manager Mike Barrett goes over Commons and how you can get involved with OpenShift V3

OpenShift Commons Briefing: OpenShift on OpenStack at Cisco By Daneyon Hansen

Daneyon Hansen talks about his experience deploying and contributing to OpenShift on OpenStack at Cisco.

OpenShift Commons Briefing: Java EE Workflows on OpenShift with Arun Gupta (Red Hat) By Arun Gupta

Director of Developer Advocay at Red Hat Arun Gupta demonstrates some of the Java EE workflows on OpenShift.
